title: Why don't i receive the icon?
body:
I thought that if you have a 'limited edition' treatment on a skin, you get an icon as well, or was that only for the first batch of limited edition skins?

Since the update, I've had the limited edition treatment banner for Frozen Shen, but haven't got any icon?

i didn't know that you get loading screen treatment for Legacy skins, but maybe it had something to do with owning the original skin before the update, i was just wondering if i do get the icon as well?

Im really chuffed that it has a special treatment tho :D i love the skin!! I've always wanted one of those loading screen treatments and am glad its for an epic skin!

just wondering if a RIOT guy could let me know if i should have unlocked the icon or not? 
thanks :)

Have you searched all your Summoner Icons? The icon is very old, so it probably won't appear at the top.
yea i have done that, but its isn't there.

Where did Riot say this would happen? I've been hunting in the news section, but I can't find anything on special skin banners or icons for Shen.

It would be helpful if you could supply me with a link, it's possible you misread something. If it's true though, I wouldn't mind getting an icon myself to be honest ;)
It was a while ago. Here ya go: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins

Yeah, I believe that you should've unlocked both the Vintage Overlay as well as the Vintage Icon. To have Riot look into this, send a ticket to Riot Games Player Support: (PS: Nice Teamwork Ribbon!)
____________

As you submit your request, here are some tips that will help resolve this issue as quickly as possible: 

1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Player Support Specialist's request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue.
2. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. (They're doing their best to help you!)
3. Try not create a new ticket or respond to an existing ticket before a Player Support Specialist has had the chance to review your request. New tickets/replies may bump your ticket back to the bottom of the queue, thus increasing the amount of time before a Player Support Specialist is able to review your ticket.
